rooms.description: North-facing entrance with ample space for reception and transitional circulation
Spacious living area with large windows to ensure natural light and ventilation; centrally located near the courtyard.
Integrated dining space adjacent to the living room; designed for family meals and social gatherings.
Modern kitchen layout placed towards the rear of the ground floor for efficient workflow and smoke ventilation.
Cozy library with wall shelves, ample natural light through north-facing windows; a quiet space for reading and study.
Comfortable guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom and access to the courtyard via sliding doors.
Spacious master bedroom located on a quiet section of the ground floor, with south exposure for enhanced sunlight as per Vastu.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned to north for positive energy flow and minimal obstructions.
Large windows to maximize natural light and cross ventilation across key living spaces.
Direct access from the living area to the central courtyard, promoting airflow and connectivity.
Balcony door providing a private outdoor space with views of the surrounding greenery.
